entry.title: Livestream #03 Replay
entry.content:
May 8th, 2020

The third installment of my new Quaran-tainment livestream series. Shooting for bi-weekly on these going forward, so tune in on the 22nd for the next edition!

entry.title: Sines of Life 69: Stir Crazy
entry.content:
A little something to keep you dancing in your living rooms, which is just about the only place any of us are dancing at present. This oneâ€™s got some fun, some funk, and a whole lot of catchy vocals, coming at you from a wide array of artists including Kaskade, Sam Smith, JackLNDN, Tinlicker, and many more. I even snuck one in from Carly Rae to keep the fiancÃ© happy.

Be good to each other, enjoy, and turn it upâ€¦ oh, and wash your hands (weâ€™ll look back and laugh at this later.. I hope)

Download this mix.


Tracklist

  1. Tinlicker - Fractal
  2. Kaskade - Love Like That
  3. Lane 8 - Just
  4. Bob Moses - Listen To Me (Cassian Remix)
  5. Goldroom feat. Love, Alexa - I Can Feel It
  6. Luttrell - What Do You Feel

  10. Sam Smith, Normani - Dancing With A Stranger
